response.original_title: Das Aktionstheater Des Hermann Nitsch Zwischen Herkunft Und Zukunft
response.overview: Actions 1962–2003 (1 DVD-PAL) plus a CD containing recordings from the Burgtheater performance 2005.  Hand-numbered first edition of 1000 copies. The packaging consists of a slip lid box with banderole, containing an 80 page book with photos and texts.  On the DVD there is a 4-hour overview of all "Actions" of 1962–2003, as well as an interview from 2005. The 80-page book (German/English) with a text by Florian Schreiner and numerous photos explains the theoretical basis of Nitsch’s work. The CD contains recordings of the 122nd "Action" from the castle theatre Vienna (Burgtheater).
response.title: The Action Art Of Hermann Nitsch From Past To Present

titles.title: The Action Art Of Hermann Nitsch From Past To Present
